General.Name: Hankook Tire
General.Description: Hankook Tire & Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells tires worldwide. It offers tires for electric vehicles, passenger cars, SUVs, light trucks, buses, and trucks under the iON, Ventus, Dynapro, Kinergy, Winter i*cept & Winter i*pike, and Smart brands. The company was formerly known as Hankook Tire Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hankook Tire & Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2019. The company was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
